about.title: Singapore-based Software Engineer passionate with innovative tech development and creation.
about.description: Currently based in Singapore, Leonard spent his time in self-development via various platforms such as Udemy, Coursera, Stackoverflow, YouTube, to strengthen his knowledge and techstacks covering topic ranges from Cloud, DevOps, Frontend and Backend Development. He is highly enthusiasthic with software development work and also expressed passions in exploring high-resolution video games.

education.qualification: Bachelor Degree in Computer Science and Web & Mobile Application Development (Double Major)
education.comment: Throughout the programme, I've equipped myself with strong Computer Science fundamentals alongside with Software Engineering knowledge to develop industrial and production ready applications, in the form of web and mobile.

education.qualification: Bachelor Degree in Science, Petroleum Geology
education.comment: All about rocks, soils, and fossils! I've spent most of my time out in the field for mapping projects and sample collection. Analyzing rocks sample in the lab could be quite boring, but it definitely tell us alot about our ancestors.

techstacks.title: Java
techstacks.description: Familiar with OOP concepts such as encapsulation & inheritance. Developed a full stack microservices application.

techstacks.title: Spring Boot
techstacks.description: Developed Microservices application using Spring Boot supported with Docker and Amazon AWS

techstacks.title: ReactJS
techstacks.description: Spent more than 80-hours in self-learning ReactJs by creating different web applications. FYI, this page is created with ReactJs.

techstacks.title: JavaScript
techstacks.description: Consistently working on Hackerrank to improve  JavaScript proficiency, while also actively using it on other frameworks.

techstacks.title: Amazon AWS
techstacks.description: Leveraging high availability and scalability of the cloud infrastructure, my applications will always perform at its best shot.

techstacks.title: Docker
techstacks.description: Hands-on experience deploying 8 microservices application using Docker containers integrated with Swarm.

techstacks.title: NodeJS
techstacks.description: Fairly new to Nodejs still, but I've created a web application using the MERN stack, which is supported by Nodejs as the backend.

techstacks.title: MongoDB
techstacks.description: My first NoSQL database experience with MongoDB Atlas was superb! Data were stored in JSON format and made it easy to access.

projects.title: Lighting Management System (LMS)
projects.description: Java Spring Boot-based Microservices application that provides a central controlling platform for user to manipulate Smart Lights.

projects.title: Online Delivery Tracking System
projects.description: Simple MERN stack application that allows consumer to track their delivery parcel locations.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Find out more about Leonard via his personal portfolio created with self-learned ReactJS.

projects.title: GoWhere
projects.description: A platform where users are able to share photo and location of unique places they have been to.

projects.title: Kuniyakino
projects.description: An Android eCommerce application backed by Java and SQLite which allow users to purchase books online.

employment.description: Developed a Lighting Management System (LMS) that provides centralized control of Smart Light that are deployed onsite. Users are able to control, configure, monitor, manipulate, and troubleshoot Smart Light via MQTT communication.
employment.technology: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, ReactJs, Jwt, Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Docker, Swarm, AWS Cloud
employment.achievement: Perform re-architecture of the Lighting Management System (LMS) to a Microservice 3-tier application using Docker and AWS within 4-months.
